articles.description: Listen to Sportsound of BBC Radio 5 live commentary and follow live text updates plus match stats from Bayern Munich vs Celtic in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Bayern Munich vs Celtic: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: George Russell says he has "no intention" of speaking to Max Verstappen to clear the air following their row at the end of last season.
articles.title: George Russell has 'no intention' of speaking to Max Verstappen following row

articles.description: USA and Oman make history by not bowling a single ball of pace during their ICC Men's Cricket World Cup League 2 match in Al Amerat on Tuesday.
articles.title: USA & Oman make history with first all-spin men's ODI

articles.description: Benfica hold off a spirited comeback from Monaco to secure a place in the Champions League last 16 with a thrilling draw in Lisbon.
articles.title: Benfica 3-3 Monaco: Portuguese side snatch draw in thriller to claim last-16 spot

articles.description: AC Milan crash out of the Champions League following a draw with Feyenoord in the second leg of their knockout play-off at San Siro.
articles.title: AC Milan 1-1 Feyenoord: Dutch side claim draw to seal 2-1 aggregate win in play-off tie

articles.description: Club Brugge scored three first-half goals as they beat Atalanta to progress in the second leg of their Champions League knockout play-off at Gewiss Stadium.
articles.title: Atalanta 1-3 Club Brugge (2-5 agg): Belgian side progress to Champions League last 16

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says the partnership with Andy Murray as his coach will continue "indefinitely".
articles.title: Andy Murray: Briton to continue working as Novak Djokovic's coach 'indefinitely'

articles.description: Louis Rees-Zammit has re-signed with the Jacksonville Jaguars, but what does the deal mean for the former Wales rugby star?
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: What does new Jacksonville Jaguars deal mean for Welshman?

articles.description: Emma Raducanu suffers a hard-fought defeat by Karolina Muchova in the second round of the Dubai Tennis Championships.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: British number two loses to Karolina Muchova at Dubai Tennis Championships.

articles.description: Andrea Kimi Antonelli says the week before passing his driving test was "hell" as the 18-year-old looks ahead to his debut F1 season with Mercedes.
articles.title: Andrea Kimi Antonelli: Mercedes driver says week before passing his driving test was ‘hell’
